item.title: Maruti Suzuki Recalls 9,925 Units Of 3 Models To Rectify Possible Defect In Brake Assembly
item.description: Maruti Suzuki Recalls 9,925 Units Of 3 Models To Rectify Possible Defect In Brake Assembly The three models are Wagon R, Celerio and Ignis that are found to have a possible defect in rear brake assembly pin.
